response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #konsumentenschutz"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #consumerprotection"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #konsumentenschutz (consumer protection) are used to reach a wider audience and spark discussion on the topic.
